data_table.description: Sample ID, body site where sample was taken, analyte type, tissue or cell type of sample, name of sequence center, and tumor status of sample obtained from participants with or without type 2 diabetes and involved in the "Type 2 Diabetes Genetic Exploration by Next-generation sequencing in multi-Ethnic Samples (T2D-GENES) Project 1: Jackson Heart Study" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site from where sample was taken
